name: dn42-display-converter
description: Tool for converting the display setting in the dn42 registry-prefixes json

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib && cp -r assets lib
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && babel src -d lib --source-maps "both" && cp -r assets lib
scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -f ./lib/index.js ]; then npm install && npm run build; fi

author: DevWurm
